sentences.english: Only silent prayer, I should not have a sense of destiny, but how could I resist?
sentences.chinese: 只有默禱，我沒有命運感，但我怎麼能抗拒？

sentences.english: Before he had finished praying silently he saw Rebecca coming out with her water-jug on her shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 他剛默禱完，就看見利百加肩上扛着水罐走出來。

sentences.english: I closed my eyes briefly. God help me, I prayed.
sentences.chinese: 我閉了一下雙眼，願上帝助我，我默禱。

sentences.english: Inside the bus was a silence akin to that in a church.
sentences.chinese: 車內一片寂靜，有如教堂裏的默禱。

sentences.english: For these dead birds sigh a prayer.
sentences.chinese: 這兩隻死鳥正爲你默禱。

sentences.english: In the silent praying, the communication as a bridge is built up between God and human beings.
sentences.chinese: 在祈求默禱中，搭起神人互爲默契式的溝通橋樑。

sentences.english: Training may include courses in biblical studies, theology, contemplation, etc.
sentences.chinese: 培訓可包括聖經研究，神學，默禱等課程。

sentences.english: So I prayed to the God of heaven.
By constant contemplation on God the mind should be turned away from mundane desires.
sentences.chinese: 經由持續向神默禱，頭腦會從世俗慾望轉移。

definition: to hate and resent/angry and full of grievances
to be buried in a horse hide (idiom)/to give one's life on the battlefield
seriously ill and about to die
to hold a lamp/to light a lamp
to have an audience (with the Emperor)
World Games/abbr. for 世界運動會|世界运动会[Shi4 jie4 Yun4 dong4 hui4]
see 呂洞賓|吕洞宾[Lu:3 Dong4 bin1]
to dispatch troops/to send an army/to mobilize forces
the State of Qǐ in modern Qǐ county 杞縣|杞县, Henan (c. 1500-445 BC), a small vassal state of Shang and Western Zhou for most of its existence
to transmit Buddhist teaching/chakram or chakka (throwing disk)
